titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Albania
Albania

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Albania is in the process of opening up and modernizing its archives to provide greater transparency to its government. Albania has a law on the right to information for official documents.

div.head: Location
div.p: Albanian State Archive: Rruga “Jordan Misja” - Tirana
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Bulevardi "Gjergj Fishta" Nr.6, Tirana.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the archive and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs ahead of any visit to establish which materials might be available.
